name: RSDP Product Specific Payment Gateways
author: Deepak Vishwakarma

sections.description:
The RSDP Product Specific Payment Gateways plugin enables you to choose which payment gateways are available for each individual product in your WooCommerce store. This helps you customize payment options based on the product type, offering better flexibility and control over the checkout process.

Key Features:
* Select different payment gateways for each product
* Works with both simple and variable products
* Seamlessly integrates with WooCommerce settings
* Allows disabling unused gateways on the checkout page based on selected products

With this plugin, you can easily control which payment gateways show up based on the items in the user’s cart, ensuring a tailored experience for your customers.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later. You are free to modify and distribute it, but any distributed versions must also be licensed under the GPL.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/rsdp-product-specific-payment-gateways/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to the product edit page in WooCommerce, and you’ll find a new tab called “Payment Options” where you can select the gateways for each product.
sections.faq:
Can I enable specific payment gateways for only certain products?

Yes, you can select which payment gateways will be available for each product in your WooCommerce store from the product edit page.

What happens if I donâ€™t select any gateways for a product?

If no gateways are selected for a product, all available payment gateways will be displayed at checkout.

Is the plugin compatible with custom payment gateways?

Yes, the plugin is designed to work with any WooCommerce-compatible custom payment gateways.
sections.changelog:
2.0

  • Updated the plugin to be compatible with WordPress 6.6.
  • Improved performance and fixed minor bugs.
  • Added support for custom payment gateways.

1.0

  • Initial release of the plugin.
